content.query:
use iot;
GO

-- Query view
--select [external-ip-address] from vLatestExternalIp;
--GO


-- Update the file that stores the latest external IP
drop EXTERNAL TABLE latest_external_ip;
GO

-- Create external table as select for the latest data
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE latest_external_ip
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'latestexternalip/',
    DATA_SOURCE = [IoT-data-curated],
    FILE_FORMAT = SynapseDelimitedTextFormat
)  
AS
select [external-ip-address] from vLatestExternalIp;
GO
